name: batuara-frontend
description: Frontend projects for Casa de Caridade Batuara

scripts.install:all: cd public-website && npm install && cd ../AdminDashboard && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd public-website && npm run build && cd ../AdminDashboard && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd public-website && npm test && cd ../AdminDashboard && npm test

author: Casa de Caridade Batuara
